aboutTET.title: About TET Exam
aboutTET.subtitle: Maharashtra Teacher Eligibility Test
points: State-level exam conducted by Maharashtra State Council of Examination (MSCE), Pune
Determines eligibility for teaching positions in government and private schools
Two levels: Paper I (Class 1-5) and Paper II (Class 6-8)
150 Multiple Choice Questions with no negative marking
Minimum qualifying marks: 60% for General, 55% for OBC/SC/ST/PwD

whatIsCrackTET.title: What is CrackTET?
whatIsCrackTET.description: CrackTET is your comprehensive learning platform designed specifically for Maharashtra TET exam preparation. We provide:
features: Complete study materials aligned with the latest syllabus
Mock tests simulating the actual exam pattern
Previous year question papers with detailed solutions
Subject-wise practice tests for thorough preparation
Performance analytics to track your progress
Regular updates on exam notifications and dates
